item.description:
Che: The Argentine (part one)

Part one of Steven Soderbergh's four hour epic biopic on Che Guevara (Benicio Del Toro). Che: The Argentine covers the Cuban Revolution, depicting how Guevara and other revolutionaries under Fidel Castro's leadership toppled the Batista dictatorship.

(2009, France/Spain/USA), in English and Spanish (with subtitles) 126 min.

Watch Trailer

"Mr. Soderbergh once again offers a master class in filmmaking." - A.O. Scott, New York Times
"Benicio Del Toro ... gives a heroic performance"- Roger Ebert, Chicago Sun Times
item.how_to_find_us: meet me in the lobby by 6:50

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans
